examples.korean: It’s easy for you to tell me to keep calm, but you’re not in my position. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 나더러 진정하라고 말하기는 쉽겠지. 하지만 넌 내 입장이 아니잖아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s easy for you to tell me to keep calm, but you’re not in my position. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He wisely decided to tell the truth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 현명하게 진실을 말하기로 결심했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He wisely decided to tell the truth. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She feared to tell him the truth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그에게 진실을 말하기가 두려웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She feared to tell him the truth. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’s no better, I’m afraid to say. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이런 말하기 뭐하지만, 그도 별로 낫지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s no better, I’m afraid to say. Add to Wordbook
